name: Conswordium
description:
You are the hero. The hero only can use swords.

After a heroic nap after a party, you find yourself trapped in the Conswordium, a point-and-click museum. 

Like many heroes, you will sword your way out.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Controls (normal point-and-click):

- Click arrows to move between views, to enter doors, or turn

- Click an object in the world or your inventory, then the ? button to ask about it

- Click an object in the world then your inventory object (or vice versa) to use your inventory object on the world object

- Speaker button toggles the sound on and off
